courseDescription:
Are you looking to become a fitness trainer but don’t know where to start? If so, this course on coaching health and wellness provides you with the training and information you need to kickstart your journey to becoming a fitness trainer. We start by examining a fitness coach's roles and responsibilities along with explaining what it means to be truly ‘healthy’. We also go through various aspects of nutrition and identify its best possible sources.

Are you overwhelmed by the many diets on the market and don’t know which one to follow? The course examines the popular diets and compares their pros and cons. We also investigate the many exercise methods available for both weight loss and muscle gain. We then move on to the ‘wellness’ part of the course and emphasise mental health by providing effective tools that can help clients work and sleep better.

The best fitness coaches know how to tailor the fitness programmes according to individual client’s needs and aspirations. We provide you with the tools required to understand the client’s goals and develop the best possible relationship with them for the long term. With more and more people around the world trying to look and feel better, having the right tools as a fitness coach can offer a huge advantage. This coaching course trains you to become a top-notch fitness coach that stands apart from the competition. Sign up to learn how to coach clients to lose fat, build muscle and eat and sleep better to cultivate a ‘healthy mind in a healthy body’.
